attributes.action: Get schools and college's to remember  the 2 minute silence on the  11th of November.
attributes.additional_details: Get schools and colleges to remember the 2 minute silence on the 11th of November. It is not political. Some colleges/schools do this already lets make it a national occurance as they are a fewer WW2 veterans around. People already ignore it often in the street lets not make children ignorant of the reason people died.
